text: Robert Bouvier (1886-1978) was a Swiss philosopher noted for popularising the work of Ernst Mach in French. Bouvier spent much his career teaching evening classes and doing translation work before becoming a privatdocent at the University of Geneva. ==Publications== * (1923) La Pensée de Ernst Mach: Essai de biographie intellectuelle et critique Paris: Vélin d'Or ==References== Category:1886 births Category:1978 deaths Category:University of Geneva faculty Category:20th-century Swiss philosophers
